definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: sweep away or snatch away, catch up (NH ´[[ספ]], [[סָפָא]]  collect (rare), Targum ´[[סְפִ]] (rare), Syr.spo0  collect, pick up; Ar. safa0 of wind, raise dust and carry it away Lane:1377);—

definitions.title: Qal 1.
definitions.body: intrans.: Pf. 3 fs. [[סָֽפְתָה]] Je 12:4  be snatched away  (rd. poss. [[סָ֫פָה]] [[[סוף]]]).

trans.:  Impf. 3 fs. [[תִּסְפֶּה]] Is 7:20  sweep away beard; 2 ms. [[תִּסְפֶּה]] Ge 18:23; Ge 18:24  sweep away indiscriminately (good and bad); Inf. cstr. [[סְפוֹת]] De 29:18  to snatch away the moist with the dry (proverb. expression, cf. Dr), sf. [[לִסְפּוֹתָהּ]] Ps 40:15 to snatch it away (i.e. my life).—[[וְסָפ֫וּ]] Am 3:15 v. [[סוף]].

be swept away, destroyed, Ge 19:15 ([[בַּעֲוֹן הָעִיר]]  by reason of the iniquity of the city), v:Ge 19:17 (both J), Nu 16:26 (JE) 1Sa 12:25, 1Sa 26:10 (in battle), + [[בְּיַד]] of agent 1Sa 27:1; cf. [[וְיֵשׁ נִסְפֶּה בְּלאׂ מִשְׁפָּט]] Pr 13:23 and there is that is swept away for lack of justice.—1Ch 21:12 rd. [[נוּסְְ]] (as ‖ 2Sa 24:13, v. [[נוּס]]).

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Impf. 1 S. [[אֵסְפֶּה עָלֵימוֹ רָעוֹת]] De 32:23 I will catch up against them calamities, but read [[אׂסְפָה]] I will gather (√ [[אסף]]), or < [[אׂסִפָה]] (Di Dr Buhl:Lex 13)  I will add, i.e.multiply (√ [[יסף]]; v. Ges:§ 69 h,note).
